challenges.title: Simple Login Form
challenges.description: Create a centered login form with two inputs: email and password, and a submit button. Each input should have a visible label.
challenges.outputDescription: A neat login form, vertically stacked, centered on page.
examples: Email label + text field, Password label + password field, Login button.
challenges.starterCode:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <title>Login Form</title>
  <style>
    /* Center form, style labels and inputs */
  </style>
</head>
<body>
  <form class="login-form">
    <!-- Add labels and inputs here -->
  </form>
</body>
</html>

challenges.title: Contact Form Layout
challenges.description: Create a contact form with fields: Name, Email, Message (textarea) and a Send button. Make each field full width with some margin between them.
challenges.outputDescription: Vertical form with full-width inputs and textarea.
examples: Name, Email text fields and a larger Message box.
challenges.starterCode:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <title>Contact Form</title>
  <style>
    /* Style form, inputs, textarea and button */
  </style>
</head>
<body>
  <form class="contact-form">
    <!-- Name, Email, Message, Send button -->
  </form>
</body>
</html>

challenges.title: Styled Checkbox Group
challenges.description: Create a form with a heading "Select your interests" and several checkboxes (e.g., Coding, Music, Sports). Align them nicely in a column.
challenges.outputDescription: Heading and list of labeled checkboxes.
challenges.starterCode: Select your interests

challenges.description: Create a simple form with one text input and style it so that when focused, the border color changes and a subtle box-shadow appears.
challenges.outputDescription: Input shows different visual when focused.
examples: Default: gray border; Focused: blue border with glow.
challenges.starterCode:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <title>Focus Style</title>
  <style>
    /* Style input and input:focus */
  </style>
</head>
<body>
  <input type="text" placeholder="Type something...">
</body>
</html>
